title: Breton mussels with herbs and crème fraîche
ingredients: ['30g (1 oz) butter', '2 large onions, peeled and sliced into rings', '3 stalks celery, sliced', '1.25kg (2 3/4 lb) mussels - cleaned and debearded', '350g (12 fl oz) dry white wine', '2 sprigs fresh thyme', '2 bay leaves', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1/2 (200ml) tub crème fraîche', 'handful chopped fresh parsley']
